reviewText: I havn't been able to find much info on this dvd but decided to give it a try anyway, it contains many news reels and most of Marilyn's movie trailers, very standard footage here. Although it is enjoyable, I don't like that the trailers are mixed in with the news reels. I was also disappointed that the songs are not video clips from her movies they are only in audio. I liked the "Marilyn at the movies dvd much better" but if you don't already have MM's songs on cd you may also like this..
